member.name: M:RekrutTask.Controllers.ExcelController.FileReceiver
member.summary:
Action of .
Receives chosen by user Excel file.
Writes to the database suitable elements.
Creates the list of unsuitable elements.
Creates for every in database and invokes DoImport() function for each of them
Depending on writing to database result, redirects on the appropriate page.

item.term: Chosen Excel file contains wrong data to upload.
One or more from Excel file has invalid parameter .
